name: Townlock - Around the world in 80 puzzles - London
name_original: Townlock - Around the world in 80 puzzles - London
description:
Around the world in 80 puzzles - London

The members of the "Gentlemen of science" club challenged Willy Fog to travel the world in the shortest time possible and they will do everything to make its journey fail.

He is very happy that you agreed to help him. This is an adventure that will make history!

You will depart from London and travel around the world. Each city has its own mysteries from find out to be able to proceed along the journey.

You have 80 puzzles to be solved to come back as winners!

You can play the adventure using this link directly: London (this for Italian version). If you enjoy playing it, please share the link with your friends!

Townlock features
  • Play on any device with any browser (the game was designed for mobile phones and tablets, but can also be played on PCs).
  • You can play alone o with your friends
  • Geo-located adventures available (no geographical limits, just your desire to explore).
  • Multi-choice and multi-path adventures available with the possibility of multi ending adventures.
  • A WEB console to build your own adventures to play with your friends or to promote your activity or your city (working in progress)
